subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: In exchange for Eddy Curry two years ago, the Knicks gave up their first-round pick in 2006 and gave the Bulls the right to swap first-round picks in this year’s draft.
snippet: In exchange for Eddy Curry two years ago, the Knicks gave up their first-round pick in 2006 and gave the Bulls the right to swap first-round picks in this year’s draft.
